Class DropletCreator

java.lang.Object
com.github.cowwoc.digitalocean.resource.DropletCreator
public final class DropletCreator extends Object
Creates a new droplet.

  • Constructor Details

    • DropletCreator

      public DropletCreator(DigitalOceanClient client, String name, DropletType type, DropletImage image, Vpc vpc)
      Creates a new instance.
      Parameters:
      client - the client configuration
      name - the name of the droplet. Names are case-insensitive.
      type - the machine type of the droplet
      image - the image ID of a public or private image or the slug identifier for a public image that will be used to boot this droplet
      vpc - the VPC to which the droplet will be assigned
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any of the arguments are null
      IllegalArgumentException - if:
      • the name contains any characters other than A-Z, a-z, 0-9 and a hyphen.
      • the name does not start or end with an alphanumeric character.
      • any of the arguments contain leading or trailing whitespace or are empty.
      See Also:
      • Vpc.getDefault(DigitalOceanClient, Zone)

    • tag

      public DropletCreator tag(String tag)
      Adds a tag to the droplet.
      Parameters:
      tag - the tag to add
      Returns:
      this
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if tag is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if the tag:
      • contains any characters other than letters, numbers, colons, dashes and underscores.
      • is longer than 255 characters.

    • tags

      public DropletCreator tags(Collection<String> tags)
      Adds tags to the droplet.
      Parameters:
      tags - the tags to add
      Returns:
      this
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if tags is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if any of the tags:
      • are null.
      • contain any characters other than letters, numbers, colons, dashes and underscores.
      • is longer than 255 characters.

    • tags

      public Set<String> tags()
      Returns the droplet's tags.
      Returns:
      the tags

    • userData

      public DropletCreator userData(String userData)
      Sets the droplet's "user data" which may be used to configure the Droplet on the first boot, often a "cloud-config" file or Bash script. It must be plain text and may not exceed 64 KiB in size.
      Parameters:
      userData - the user data
      Returns:
      this
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if userData is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if userData:
      • contains leading or trailing whitespace.
      • is empty.
      • is longer than 64 KiB characters.

    • userData

      public String userData()
      Returns the droplet's "user data" which may be used to configure the Droplet on the first boot, often a "cloud-config" file or Bash script. It must be plain text and may not exceed 64 KiB in size.
      Returns:
      the user data

    • create

      public Droplet create() throws PermissionDeniedException, IOException, TimeoutException, InterruptedException
      Creates a new droplet.
      Returns:
      the new droplet
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the client is closed
      PermissionDeniedException - if the request exceeded the client's droplet limit
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs. These errors are typically transient, and retrying the request may resolve the issue.
      TimeoutException - if the request times out before receiving a response. This might indicate network latency or server overload.
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while waiting for a response. This can happen due to shutdown signals.
